channel.title: Smithing Interface
channel.description: I know this is not simple, but how do I add the smithing interface for my smithing skill? I searched it but I could not find a tutorial.

item.title: Smithing Interface
item.dc:creator: @Impious_Lols Impious Lols
item.description:
@Impious_Lols wrote:

[quote=“mmaKush, post:2, topic:350940”]You’d do something like this in your item on object packet;

case ****: <----- Anvil Id if (playerHasItem(****)) { <----- Hammer Id showInterface(****); <----- Smithing interface Id } break; [/quote]

Where would I put that?

Read full topic

item.title: Smithing Interface
item.dc:creator: @mmaKush mmaKush
item.description:
@mmaKush wrote:

You’d do something like this in your item on object packet;

case ****: <----- Anvil Id
     if (playerHasItem(****)) { <----- Hammer Id
          showInterface(****); <----- Smithing interface Id
     }
     break;

Read full topic
